successes.title: Ava's Demon: Book One
successes.description: Ava's Demon is a science fiction webcomic about a girl named Ava and the demon haunting her. Help fund its first book!

Pledges.description:
DIGITAL PACT - A high-resolution download of the book in its entirety 
and three HD 1080p downloads of the chapter animations, plus my undying gratitude to you, kind backer!
ONLY THE RED KEY - A red plastic 3D printed key replica on a wearable necklace. With this you will also get the PDF and three animation downloads.
VANILLA PACT - The Ava's Demon first edition, 9''x9'' hardcover book in all its glory. With this you will also get the PDF and three animation downloads.
SIGNED PACT - The Ava's Demon book SIGNED by the author and a random panel print. With this you will also get the PDF and the 3 downloads of the HD animations.
ONLY THE BRONZE KEY - Ava's bronze key necklace in a satin bag. With this you will also get a random panel print, the PDF and the 3 downloads of the HD animations.
BUTTON AND FINE ART PACT - A set of buttons with characters and 1 random fine art print by either the author or the official artists.
PLUS The Ava's Demon book SIGNED by the author, PDF, Animation downloads, and 1 random panel print.
THE RED KEY AND BOOK- A polished-plastic, to-scale replica of Ava's Key on a wearable necklace.
PLUS the Ava's Demon book SIGNED by the author, PDF, Animation downloads, 1 random panel print, a set of buttons, and 1 random fine art print.

THE BRONZE KEY AND BOOK - A bronze-plated, to-scale replica of Ava's Key on a wearable necklace presented to you in a red satin bag and a signed book, TWO random fine art prints, 1 random panel print, and the downloadable PDF of the book and all three animations.
BRONZE KEY, BOOK, AND MORE - A bronze-plated, to-scale replica of Ava's Key on a wearable necklace presented to you in a red satin bag....
PLUS the Ava's Demon book SIGNED by the author with the PDF, Animation downloads, 1 random panel print, a set of buttons, and TWO random fine art prints.

THE "PACT MAKER" - The Ava's Demon book SIGNED by the author with the "OFFICIAL PACT MAKER" seal on the back cover, THREE fine art prints, A bronze-plated, to-scale replica of Ava's Key on a wearable necklace presented to you in a red satin bag, PDF, animation downloads, 1 random panel print, and a set of buttons.
THE INK PACT - Signed original ink illustration of a random character, presented to you in a protective sleeve.

PLUS the Ava's Demon book SIGNED by the author with the "OFFICIAL PACT MAKER" seal on the back cover, A bronze-plated, to-scale replica of Ava's Key on a wearable necklace presented to you in a red satin bag, PDF, animation downloads, 1 random panel print, a set of buttons, and ALL fine art prints.
THE PAINT PACT - Signed original mini painting of a random character from the comic, presented to you in a protective sleeve, as well as an ink drawing of a random character.
